arts.ttl: Lecce vs. Como to get matchday 33 underway
arts.sum: Among the teams against whom Como have never lost in Serie A, Lecce are the one they have faced the most: four wins and a draw for the Lariani. Como have faced Lecce twice away from home in Serie A, between 1985 and 1989: a 4-1 away victory in the first match and a 0-0 draw in the most recent one.
Joe Casey has taken a look at the fixture list for matchday 33 of the Serie A season, picking out a score prediction for each match.

Lecce are coming off a good second half in Turin, but their improved effort was enough to complete a late comeback against Juventus and avoid their sixth defeat in the last seven matches. On the othe...
